title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang (Captioned)
creator_credit: Ken Adam, Ken Hughes, Albert R. Broccoli, Dramatic Features and Warfield Productions
brief_description: The author of James Bond, Ian Fleming, wrote this charming story of a car that could fly. This is a wonderful musical/comedy fantasy for the whole family starring Dick Van Dyke and Gert Frobe. It is recreated for the screen by the director Ken Hughes of “Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines”.
creator_credit_for_label: Ken Adam, Ken Hughes, Albert R. Broccoli, Dramatic Features and Warfield Productions
